reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 275/91: METHOD OF SELECTING REGIONAL REPRESENTATIVES-CITY OF GLOUCESTER
reg_info.reg_name_text: METHOD OF SELECTING REGIONAL REPRESENTATIVES — CITY OF GLOUCESTER
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 275/91: METHOD OF SELECTING REGIONAL REPRESENTATIVES-CITY OF GLOUCESTER
reg_info.act_under: Regional Municipality of Ottawa-Carleton Act   Loi sur la municipalité régionale d’Ottawa-Carleton

content.content: 2. Despite section 3 of the Act, on and after the 1st day of December, 1991, The Corporation of the City of Gloucester shall be represented on the Regional Council by, (a) the mayor of the City; and (b) two members of the council of the City elected by general vote. O.Reg. 275/91.
content.raw_html:
2. Despite section 3 of the Act, on and after the 1st day of December, 1991, The Corporation of the City of Gloucester shall be represented on the Regional Council by,

(a) the mayor of the City; and

(b) two members of the council of the City elected by general vote. O.Reg. 275/91.
